context: Just wait till they have fully enormous submarines... no crew to feed... fully nuclear... can stay out for years and you never know where the ICBMs will ever be... maybe two to four people for maintenance.
Navy Ships are considered American Sovereign Soil, and an attack against it is considered an act of war. How will these bots be considered?

replies.context: One good thing...I’m sure they won’t accidentally collided with other vessels.
hahah... as a former SWO, that is messed up... but oh, so funny and true... no cat fights onboard.

context:
What a novel idea, radio controlled ships.

So what happens when the enemy jams the signal controlling this thing, then send out a manned ship to capture it and tow it home?

This is what happens when your "innovators" are computer games geeks!

replies.context: I'm sure they haven't thought of that yet. You should apply at DARPA.

context:

Even domestically, civilian drones (UAV) have politicians scared.
